title: The Prototype Nantucket Style Home
text:
The Prototype Nantucket Style Home 9/24/2015 10:00AM These days, all sorts of homes are labeled “Nantucket style”. But to understand the real deal requires a visit to Francis Farrell and Jennifer Sell's small home on the island’s main cliff. Photo: Bob O'Connor for The Wall Street Journal Transcript
